events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Senior Software Engineer role. Their resume highlights strong experience with backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering team due to the candidate's background in software development and DevOps practices.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process and will coordinate the upcoming interview stages.
Conducted the initial phone screening with the candidate. They demonstrated a solid understanding of software engineering principles and cloud infrastructure.
Candidate responded promptly to the scheduling request and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview opportunity.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 2 PM UTC with the engineering panel.
